column4: Hi! I'm using some ajax web-based irc, because I don't have an irc client installed atm on my windows machine. I have a question: How can you delete recent files/documents history in Open Office? I can't find the feature so I think I'll switch to AbiWord and Gnumerics. Any ideas? Could the Ubuntu team suggest that feature to Open Office. I tried, but no reply.
i would check the Openoffice channel and website/docs - i imagine theres a way to do it.
from a quick google at  http://www.oooforum.org/forum/viewtopic.phtml?t=65992   - there seems tobe some macros made that do just that.. or you can manually delete some cache type file.
some of the later comments mentiont hat the macro does work.. but  Im not using OOo so i cant test it. Good luck. and id say ask in  the Openoffice channel.  could be its going to be in OOO3
